Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at State/116th
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, State, 111th, Wentworth and 115th due to street blockage near State/116th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, State, 111th, Wentworth and 115th due to street blockage near State/116th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Harrison/Western
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted EB: Harrison, Western, Jackson, Damen and Harrison; WB: Harrison, Damen, Van Buren, Western and Harrison due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Harrison/Western.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Damen and Harrison.

Westbound buses will operate via Harrison, Damen, Van Buren, Western and Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.
